mapper.select: SELECT users.user_id, users.display_name, users.photo_url, ( SELECT count(*) FROM articles AS art WHERE art.user_id = qiita_count.posted_user_id AND (art.state_flag = 1 OR art.state_flag = 2) ) AS fb_count, ( SELECT count(*) FROM articles AS art WHERE art.user_id = qiita_count.posted_user_id AND (art.state_flag = 1 OR art.state_flag = 2) ) AS post_art_count, qiita_count.cnt AS qiita_rec_all_count FROM ( SELECT posted_user_id, count(*) AS cnt FROM qiita_recommends GROUP BY posted_user_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC ) AS qiita_count LEFT OUTER JOIN users ON qiita_count.posted_user_id = users.user_id;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qiita_recommends(article_id, posted_user_id, recommend_user_id) VALUES (#{articleId}, #{postedUserId}, #{recommendUserId});
